name: Block Buster HD
description:
Think fast, break all the blocks and set the star free.

Your best friend "Puppy Star" is in trouble, help him escape the pit of the dammed by destroying all the bricks blocking his way.

- 35 varying levels.

- Extremely addictive, easy to start – hard to quit.

- Save and continue from any point in the game.

- 3 difficulty levels, can you master all of them?

- World leaderboard. Show who’s the quickest mind on earth.

How to play:

Move and rotate your blocks into place and drop them to explode the bricks that blocks the way up.

Create chain explosions for diamonds to emerge, collect them and use them to revive your friend star and continue the game.
